mxModelCodec.js

Summary
mxModelCodec.js
Functions
encodeEncode the given mxGraphModel by writing a (flat) XML sequence of cell nodes as produced by the <mxCellCodec>.
decodeChildOverrides decode child to handle special child nodes.
decodeRootReads the cells into the graph model.

Functions

encode

codec.encode = function(enc,
obj)

Encode the given mxGraphModel by writing a (flat) XML sequence of cell nodes as produced by the <mxCellCodec>.  The sequence is wrapped-up in a node with the name root.

decodeChild

codec.decodeChild = function(dec,
child,
obj)

Overrides decode child to handle special child nodes.

decodeRoot

codec.decodeRoot = function(dec,
root,
model)

Reads the cells into the graph model.  All cells are children of the root element in the node.

codec.encode = function(enc,
obj)
Encode the given mxGraphModel by writing a (flat) XML sequence of cell nodes as produced by the mxCellCodec.
function mxGraphModel(root)
Constructs a new graph model.
